summary: Audio recording application with button state management
architectural_notes: Recording button has blue inactive state and red active state
Button must maintain opacity on hover/unhover
known_issues: Recording button stays red after recording stops instead of returning to blue
Recording button becomes transparent when cursor leaves

existing_features.title: When recording stops, the recording button must immediately return to its inactive blue state instead of staying red
The recording button must maintain its opacity and not become transparent when the cursor leaves the button area

projectName: Fix recording button state transitions and hover behavior
